===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{lb|zh|literary|or|Min}} to [[chase]]; to [[pursue]]
# {{lb|zh|literary|or|Min}} to [[follow]]; to [[accompany]]
# to [[take advantage]] of ([[time]], [[opportunity]], etc); to [[avail]] oneself of

# {{lb|zh|Mandarin|colloquial}} to [[have]] [[a lot]] of
#: {{zh-x|趁錢|wealthy}}

#: {{zh-x|趁.熱.打.鐵|to strike while the iron is hot}}
